room_title: Escape room "Vault" by Project: Escape in Atlanta
review: Great way to spend a birthday with close friends! Vault 202 was awesome! Thank you to Tori for being a great host! We will definitely be back to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Vault" by Project: Escape in Atlanta
review: Vault 202 was the very first escape room for 8 out of 10 of our group, and it was a wonderful experience from the waiting room to the exit! The vault was wonderfully atmospheric and challenging; we really felt like we'd accomplished something wonderful when we escaped with minutes to spare! Chandler was a wonderful master of games and we all enjoyed his guidance and camera concealed presence! Many thanks and we hope to visit again soon!!

room_title: Escape room "Vault" by Project: Escape in Atlanta
review: Went with some friends of ours from out of town and successfully completed Vault 202! We had a blast! It was definitely challenging but not impossible. Super nice decor, friendly staff, and unique challenges made for an overall great experience.

room_title: Escape room "Vault" by Project: Escape in Atlanta
review: We did Vault with 3 people and didn't finish. The room looked great and had some awesome special effects. The puzzles were tricky but there were unlimited clues, so that was nice. I will definitely be back to try more rooms!
